main.name: Angel Lee
main.description: A problem solver with software engineering and data analysis skills.
main.detailedDescription: Professional experiences at a top strategy consulting firm and a financial data science startup.
main.bio1: I solve problems quantitatively, using statistical data analysis skills, and qualitatively, using structured thinking and analysis skills. There is a  strong connection between data and business, and I am interested in applying advanced data analysis techniques into the business decision-making process.
main.bio2: I am also a full-stack web developer developing frontend with react, backend with flask, and mySQL for database. Hopefully I create something that's useful and actually solves problems.
main.bio3: Currently on the way to becoming a data-driven Data Scientist that helps companies understand the full value of data to better identify business opportunities
main.contactmessage: Look forward to hearing from you! Feel free to contact me through email or connect on Linkedin!
